attributes.action: Petition to reallocate all foreign aid to help British people in need
attributes.additional_details: Estimates put 1 in 3 children in Britain living below the poverty line. Single-parent families, minimum wage workers and a growing homeless population. And yet the British government sees fit to waste vast sums to corrupt foreign regimes. This petition is for all people who feel that the British Government has made a serious error in their spending plans.
